languages.text: {n}Арлекин удивленно наклоняет голову, глядя то на вас, то на Кассию, а затем давится смешком.{/n} "С чего вы взяли, мон-кай, что я стану выполнять ваши приказы? Я не палач для трехоких созерцателей Ша'эиль, о нет. Я губитель каждого, кто осквернил сей Первый Мир своим присутствием. Да начнется финальный танец!" {n}Арлекин наиграно кланяется и зажимает кнопку на странном устройстве в руках.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Арлекин удивленно наклоняет голову, глядя то на вас, то на Кассию, а затем давится смешком.{/n} "С чего вы взяли, мон-кай, что я стану выполять ваши приказы? Я не палач для трехоких созерцателей Ша'эиль, о нет. Я губитель каждого, кто осквернил сей Первый Мир своим присутсвием. Да начнется финальный танец!" {n}Арлекин наиграно кланяется и зажимает кнопку на странном устройстве в руках.{/n}
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}The Harlequin tilts his head in surprise, looks at you and Cassia in turn, and then stifles a chuckle.{/n} "What makes you mon-keigh think that I will do your bidding? I am not the executioner of three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil, oh no. I am the bane of all who have tainted this Crone World with their presence. Let the final dance begin!" {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically as he presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n}

Да начнется финальный танец!" {n}Арлекин наиграно кланяется и зажимает кнопку на странном устройстве в руках.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハーレクィンは驚いて首をかしげると、あなたとカシアを交互に見る。それから、くすくす笑いをこらえだす。{/n}「どうして僕が君たちモン＝ケイの命令に従うと思うんだい？僕はシャーエイルをのぞく三つ目のモン＝ケイの処刑人じゃないよ、やれやれ。存在するだけでこの老朽惑星を汚す者を壊すのが僕だ。最後のダンスを始めるよ！」{n}ハーレクィンは観客に向けるようなお辞儀をすると、手にしていた見慣れぬ装置のボタンをぐっと押し続ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin tilts his head in surprise, looks at you and Cassia in turn, and then stifles a chuckle.{/n} "What makes you mon-keigh think that I will do your bidding? I am not the executioner of three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil, oh no. I am the bane of all who have tainted this Crone World with their presence. Let the final dance begin!" {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically as he presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハーレクィンは驚いて首をかしげると、あなたとカシアを交互に見る。それから、くすくす笑いをこらえだす。{/n}「どうして僕が君たちモン＝ケイの命令に従うと思うんだい？僕はシャーエイルをのぞく三つ目のモン＝ケイの処刑人じゃないよ、やれやれ。存在するだけでこの老朽惑星を汚す者を壊すのが僕だ。最後のダンスを始めるよ！」{n}ハーレクィンは観客に向けるようなお辞儀をすると、手にしていた見慣れぬ装置のボタンをぐっと押し続ける。{/n}
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}丑角惊讶地转过了头，依次打量着你和卡西娅，随后憋住了笑。{/n}“你们这些猴子，你凭什么觉得我会听从你们的命令？你凭什么认为，我不会处决那个能看到纱芮尔的三眼猴子？噢，不，我会为所有玷污老妪世界的人带来末日。是时候开始最后的舞蹈了！”{n}丑角一边按住手中古怪装置的按钮，一边戏剧性地鞠了一躬。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin tilts his head in surprise, looks at you and Cassia in turn, and then stifles a chuckle.{/n} "What makes you mon-keigh think that I will do your bidding? I am not the executioner of three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil, oh no. I am the bane of all who have tainted this Crone World with their presence. Let the final dance begin!" {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically as he presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}丑角惊讶地转过了头，依次打量着你和卡西娅，随后憋住了笑。{/n}“你们这些猴子，你凭什么觉得我会听从你们的命令？你凭什么认为，我不会处决那个能看到纱芮尔的三眼猴子？噢，不，我会为所有玷污老妪世界的人带来末日。是时候开始最后的舞蹈了！”{n}丑角一边按住手中古怪装置的按钮，一边戏剧性地鞠了一躬。{/n}
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Visiblement surpris, l'Arlequin incline la tête sur le côté et vous regarde tour à tour vous et Cassia avant de laisser échapper un petit rire.{/n} « Et pourquoi devrais-je me plier à la volonté de vulgaires mon-keigh ? Je ne serai pas le bourreau des mon-keigh à trois yeux qui peuvent voir dans le Sha'eil, ça non. Par contre, je serai le fléau de tous ceux qui ont souillé ce monde déchu de leur présence. L'heure de la dernière danse est venue ! » {n}L'Arlequin s'incline comme s'il saluait son public puis appuie sur un bouton de l'étrange appareil qu'il tient en main.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin tilts his head in surprise, looks at you and Cassia in turn, and then stifles a chuckle.{/n} "What makes you mon-keigh think that I will do your bidding? I am not the executioner of three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil, oh no. I am the bane of all who have tainted this Crone World with their presence. Let the final dance begin!" {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically as he presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Visiblement surpris, l'arlequin incline la tête sur le côté et vous regarde tour à tour vous et Cassia avant de laisser échapper un petit rire.{/n} « Et pourquoi devrais-je me plier à la volonté de vulgaires mon-keigh ? Je ne serai pas le bourreau des mon-keigh à trois yeux qui peuvent voir dans le Sha'eil, ça non. Par contre, je serai le fléau de tous ceux qui ont souillé ce monde déchu de leur présence. L'heure de la dernière danse est venue ! » {n}L'arlequin s'incline comme s'il saluait son public puis appuie sur un bouton de l'étrange appareil qu'il tient en main.{/n}
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}El Arlequín ladea la cabeza, sorprendido, y pasa su mirada de ti a Cassia mientras ahoga una risita.{/n} «¿Qué os hace pensar que seguiré vuestras órdenes, mon-keigh? Yo no soy el verdugo de los mon-keigh de tres ojos que ven el Sha'eil, no. Soy la perdición de todos los que han mancillado este mundo ancestral con su presencia. ¡Que dé comienzo el último baile!». {n}El Arlequín hace una reverencia teatral mientras aprieta un botón del extraño dispositivo en su mano y lo mantiene presionado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin tilts his head in surprise, looks at you and Cassia in turn, and then stifles a chuckle.{/n} "What makes you mon-keigh think that I will do your bidding? I am not the executioner of three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil, oh no. I am the bane of all who have tainted this Crone World with their presence. Let the final dance begin!" {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically as he presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Arlequín ladea la cabeza, sorprendido, y pasa su mirada de ti a Cassia mientras ahoga una risita.{/n} «¿Qué os hace pensar que seguiré vuestras órdenes, mon-keigh? Yo no soy el verdugo de los mon-keigh de tres ojos que ven el Sha'eil, no. Soy la perdición de todos los que han mancillado este mundo ancestral con su presencia. ¡Que dé comienzo el último baile!». {n}El Arlequín hace una reverencia teatral mientras aprieta un botón del extraño dispositivo en su mano y lo mantiene presionado.{/n}
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Der Harlekin legt überrascht den Kopf schief, blickt erst dich und dann Cassia an und unterdrückt dann ein Lachen.{/n} "Was lässt Euch Chem-Pan-Sey glauben, dass ich Euch gehorche? Ich bin nicht der Henker der dreiäugigen Chem-Pan-Sey, die nach Sha'eil sehen, oh nein. Ich bin die Geißel aller, die diese Hexenwelt durch den Makel ihrer Anwesenheit entweiht haben. Lasst den letzten Tanz beginnen!" {n}Der Harlekin verneigt sich theatralisch und drückt und hält eine Taste auf dem merkwürdigen Gerät in seiner Hand.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin tilts his head in surprise, looks at you and Cassia in turn, and then stifles a chuckle.{/n} "What makes you mon-keigh think that I will do your bidding? I am not the executioner of three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil, oh no. I am the bane of all who have tainted this Crone World with their presence. Let the final dance begin!" {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically as he presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Harlekin legt überrascht den Kopf schief, blickt erst dich und dann Cassia an und unterdrückt dann ein Lachen.{/n} "Was lässt Euch Chem-Pan-Sey glauben, dass ich Euch gehorche? Ich bin nicht der Henker der dreiäugigen Chem-Pan-Sey, die nach Sha'eil sehen, oh nein. Ich bin die Geißel aller, die diese Hexenwelt durch den Makel ihrer Anwesenheit entweiht haben. Lasst den letzten Tanz beginnen!" {n}Der Harlekin verneigt sich theatralisch und drückt und hält eine Taste auf dem merkwürdigen Gerät in seiner Hand.{/n}
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Arleken, şaşkınlıkla başını yana eğiyor. Sırayla sana ve Cassia'ya bakıp kendini gülmekten alıkoyuyor.{/n} "Siz mon-keighler neden her dediğinizi yapacağımı sanıyorsunuz? Sha'eil'i gören üç gözlü mon-keigh'in celladı değilim ya. Yok, ben bu Acuze Dünya'ya ayak basıp kirleten herkesin başının belasıyım. Son dansımız başlasın!" {n}Sahnedeymişçesine reverans yapan Arleken, elindeki tuhaf cihazın üzerindeki bir düğmeye basıp ardından basılı tutuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin tilts his head in surprise, looks at you and Cassia in turn, and then stifles a chuckle.{/n} "What makes you mon-keigh think that I will do your bidding? I am not the executioner of three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil, oh no. I am the bane of all who have tainted this Crone World with their presence. Let the final dance begin!" {n}The Harlequin bows theatrically as he presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Arleken, şaşkınlıkla başını yana eğiyor. Sırayla sana ve Cassia'ya bakıp kendini gülmekten alıkoyuyor.{/n} "Hayırdır, siz mon-keighler neden her dediğinizi yapacağımı sanıyorsunuz? Sha'eil'i gören üç gözlü mon-keighin celladı değilim ya. Yok, ben bu Acuze Dünya'ya ayak basıp kirleten herkesin başının belasıyım. Son dansımız başlasın!" {n}Sahnedeymişçesine reverans yapan Arleken, elindeki tuhaf cihazın üzerindeki bir düğmeye basıp basılı tutuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
